description:
Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’assaut de Zoro ! Les démons de glace jouent à chat
Zoro no Tsuigeki! Koorioni in Onigokko
Zorro nimmt die Verfolgung auf! – Fangen mit den Eisogern
Зоро бросается в погоню! Салочки с ледяными бесами!
مطاردة زورو! لعبة ملاحقة أوني الجليد!
ゾロの追撃! 氷鬼 in 鬼ゴッコ
